articles.title: Sun Unleashes Intense Solar Flare Causing Radio Blackout in Asia, Australia - News18
articles.description: The Sun has unleashed an intense solar flare, sparking radio blackouts in several parts of Asia and Australia.
articles.content: The Sun has unleashed an intense solar flare, sparking radio blackouts in several parts of Asia and Australia. According to the US Space Weather Prediction Center (SWPC), the solar flare peaked late … [+2449 chars]

articles.title: Marathoner Soh Rui Yong misses out on Asian Games as Singapore set to send its largest contingent - TODAY
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Singapore is set to send its largest contingent of 382 athletes to the upcoming 19th Asian Games, but without controversial marathoner Soh Rui Yong.
articles.content:

articles.title: Lion City Sailors stun K League side Daegu 3-0 in Asian Champions League clash - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: Local side Lion City Sailors notched an upset victory when they beat K League outfit Daegu FC 3-0 in an Asian Champions League group stage match on Monday (Apr 18).

Goals from Song Ui-young, Diego Lopes and Pedro Henrique sealed the win for the …

articles.title: 'Be happy, Mummy': Benjamin Tan's mum dies, almost 2 years after falling into coma - AsiaOne
